meanings.sent1: Using too much makeup sometimes uglifies a person's natural beauty.
meanings.sent2: The graffiti on the wall uglifies the entire neighborhood.
meanings.sent3: The clown's attempt to juggle ended up uglifying the birthday party.
meanings.sent4: The dark clouds uglify the once bright sky.
meanings.sent5: The old, peeling paint uglifies the historic building.

meanings.sent1: Leaving trash on the beach uglifies the pristine shore.
meanings.sent2: Over time, neglect can uglify even the most beautiful garden.
meanings.sent3: The once elegant dress slowly uglifies as it gathers dust in the closet.
meanings.sent4: The abandoned house uglifies the otherwise picturesque street.
meanings.sent5: Neglecting personal hygiene can quickly uglify a person's appearance.
